com.mk4droid.IMC_Core

Class Preference_Reset

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • com.mk4droid.IMC_Core.Preference_Reset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>

    public class Preference_Reset
extends android.preference.Preference
    Create a custom preference in Setup with the role of a button that clears all data in local data saved in SQLite db.
